snippet.title: Half-Life: VR Trailer
snippet.description:
Half-Life: VR is a highly immersive Virtual Reality mod for the classic Half-Life from 1998. Not affiliated with Valve.

On Steam Oct 19th/20th: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1908720/HalfLife_VR_Mod/

Website: https://www.halflifevr.de/

💖 If you love my work, consider supporting me on Patreon or Ko-Fi. If you want to stay up-to-date subscribe and join my Discord. Also check out my other videos on this channel. Thank you! 💖

🌐 Discord: https://discord.gg/jujwEGf62K

🍵 Ko-Fi: https://www.ko-fi.com/maxmakesmods

💸 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/maxmakesmods

📝 Github: https://github.com/maxvollmer
